<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete document full-text tag/value"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/documents/{documentId}/fulltext/tags/{tagKey}/{tagValue}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remove document tag/value from OpenSearch; ONLY available with FormKiQ Enterprise
